en.title: Application Scenarios
en.sceIntro_pri: Due to its decentralized nature, PPIO's storage network is ideal for private network storage applications.
en.sceIntro_ent: PPIO can slash costs for enterprise data storage, while providing high performance services.
en.sceIntro_dec: Your smart contracts or other decentralized application data on the blockchain can be stored on external storage by utilizing PPIO’s APIs.
en.sceIntro_med: PPIO provides cost-effective bandwidth resources that help reduce the costs of content distribution significantly.
en.sceIntro_exc: PPIO provides ways to match file assets sellers & buyers and can handle transactions safely and reliably, without requiring an intermediate party.
en.sceIntro_war: PPIO can store a huge amount of  datasets, replacing traditional unreliable local data storage and expensive cloud storage.
